@vardhanj
This kind of attitude that you have displayed is very wrong. When we write a feedback about a torrents quality, we are not criticizing the uploader. We are actually giving relevant information to future downloaders. I totally disagree with your point of view, and would continue to write comments about the quality of malikjee's torrents. I am aware that he is doing all of us a big favour, and i am myself a huge fan of malikjee. But this doent mean that potential donwloaders should not know genuine facts about torrent quality.
